channel.title: CVE Feed for Callback technologies -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Callback technologies -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-43590|2024-08-03T13:32:59.826Z -- callback%20technologies -- cbfs%20filter
item.description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability exists in the handle_ioctl_0x830a0_systembuffer functionality of Callback technologies CBFS Filter 20.0.8317. A specially crafted I/O request packet (IRP) can lead to denial of service. An attacker can issue an ioctl to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-43589|2024-08-03T13:32:59.617Z -- callback%20technologies -- cbfs%20filter
item.description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability exists in the handle_ioctl_8314C functionality of Callback technologies CBFS Filter 20.0.8317. A specially crafted I/O request packet (IRP) can lead to denial of service. An attacker can issue an ioctl to trigger this vulnerability.

item.title: CVE-2022-43588|2024-08-03T13:32:59.825Z -- callback%20technologies -- cbfs%20filter
item.description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability exists in the handle_ioctl_83150 functionality of Callback technologies CBFS Filter 20.0.8317. A specially crafted I/O request packet (IRP) can lead to denial of service. An attacker can issue an ioctl to trigger this vulnerability.
